Name: 少女的求生之路
About the game: This game tells the story of four young girls who are trying to survive through the post Apocalypse at the same time. In the monster ridden world, girls gather materials to make meals, and move forward to seek rescue and the future. 1. rich survival system and cooking system, capable of making many interesting meals. 2. performance of combat painting and ragged clothes 3. the protagonist can be transformed into a magical girl to gain greater combat effectiveness. 4. the monster is terrible and full of obscene ideas about the protagonist. 5. the powerful defeated CG is called the girl who was ravaged by monsters~ 6. if you can collect all the hidden achievements and color props, maybe something good will happen? 7. a complete story line.
